channel.title: Fucking ignorant activist
channel.description:
www.peta2.com
i feel like taking out my rage of life on stupid fuckers who post on this website.
[url=http://blog.peta2.com/2008/11/when_you_see_a_fur_coat_speak.html]dumb fuckers[/url]

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

We used to get jehovas and mormons just about every weekend.

That all changed when my dad literally picked one of them up and threw him onto the lawn (after trying to close the door twice). Similar story with a salesman, except my dad stole the merchandise before throwing the guy and was then charged for assault.

But anyways yeah peta sucks. Im against peta just as much as I am against animal cruelty. Also petatv is seriously the worst website out there. Videos of skinning dogs alive etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:31, topic:250484”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=330350.msg2585065#msg2585065 date=1229471418]

Lately, the Jehovah witnesses that come to our door get younger every year. Do they want to make it look like a young and attractive religion? At least they aren’t that pushy anymore.

The ones who come to my house are young as well.
[/quote]
By young you mean around 14-18 years old right? Cuz I have gotten thoose aswell, they are not as pushy as the older ones, in my opinion. They take no for an answer atleast.[/quote]

Sometimes even younger, but yes, most around 14-18. They only come every half year or so.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:26, topic:250484”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=330350.msg2583863#msg2583863 date=1229378579]
Vegans disgust me, I enjoy eating meat in front of them. They’re almost as bad as jehova’s witness.
[/quote]
Exactly what I was about to post!

Totally agree with you.

Anyone ever tried closing the door on the jehova’s witnesses? Well, the person I had on my doorsteps, forced his foot and made it impossible to close the door, so I slammed the door on this foot, and quickly locked the door. Fucking jehovas witnesses.[/quote]

When they come to my house, I say “Sure, you can share with me your religion, but then, let me share with you mine.” I then proceed to invite them in, and lock the dead bolt as they walk into the Living Room. They get very anxious when they hear the sound of the lock bolting behind them.

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:15, topic:250484”]As long as you’re not the one who killed the animal then it’s okay to wear fur.
I mean if you have the money to buy fur then go ahead, it’s not like you’re the one who killed it.
It’s like sending a guy who has the word “murderer” on his shirt to jail even if he didn’t kill anybody.[/quote]

As long as there are people that buy fur, there are people that kill animals to provide the fur. Your statement is false. But I know what you mean.

If the animals aren’t killed, they either die of starvation or we get problems due to the animals eating our vegetation. Animals can overpopulate this planet in the same way humans can.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:

Niall:

[quote author=Ske link=topic=330350.msg2581361#msg2581361 date=1229270374]It’s like sending a guy who has the word “murderer” on his shirt to jail even if he didn’t kill anybody.

No, it’s like sending a guy who is wearing a suit made from human skin to jail even if he didn’t kill anybody.[/quote]
haha you got a point there, but humans and animals are completely different.
If someone shot a deer, would he end up in jail?No, because people nowadays don’t see animals as real living creatures.

item.title: Fucking ignorant activist
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

i heard all human beings have come from animals. so, really, we’re all animals. if animals are allowed to eat other animals, why are we bad people for eating animals? shit. they say eating a cow is the fucking same as eating a dog.

Last week, I was with my Fiance' at Olive Garder... We were sitting on the green couches waiting to be called for our table. When the door swung open, a woman walked in. She wore a long, full-length coat or Mink (I think) and a hat that matched. As she went up to the desk and announced her reservation area, we lifted our brows.

Despite his reqests to sit silently, I got up. Sliding up next to her I looked interested. “Wow, is that real?”
She gave me a snooty, ‘Im all THAT’ look saying, “yes…”
I replied, “Oh, must’ve cost you a pretty penny huh?” She nodded as if she was annoyed of me. “Someone like me would have to save all their life or sell their soul for that kinda’ thing…” I smiled.
She stuck her nose in the air, “I’m sure it would…”
I grinned, “Well, I’m sure it cost them animals just that… their lives.”
She looked stunned like I just poured paint on her or something. “Excuse me?”
Luckily, they called our number just at that time - I simply walked away smiling and such with my arm around my Fiance’s. “You can hear them screaming now can’t yah’?” I muttered.
She was bright bright red, it was funny - she slid her coat and hat off… And I never saw her ever again… I think maybe I hit her with something.

honest to god, the followers of this shit are worse than the people running. cocky fagots.

Read full topic
